title: The Simpsons&trade;: Tapped Out v4.9.4 [Unlimited Money/Donuts/X
description:
Description:
THIS GAME IS LIFE-RUININGLY FUN! Homer accidently caused a meltdown that wiped out Springfield. DÃ¢â‚¬â„¢OH! Now, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s up to you to rebuild it! From the writers of The Simpsons, tap into a city building game that lets you create your own living, breathing Springfield

HOW FUN IS IT? LET US COUNT THE WAYS!

1. First, you can get it!
2. Make Springfield just like you want it.
3. Help Homer find Marge, Bart, Lisa, and the rest of his family and friends! (Ned Flanders, too.)
4. Complete tasks to earnÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ mmm, donuts!
5. Make Apu work ridiculously long shifts at Kwik-E-Mart.
6. Grow and harvest Tomacco on CletusÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Farm.
7. Party down with Duffman at Duff Brewery.
8. See how your Indolence, Consumerism,and Gluttony stack up on the Conform-o-meter.
9. Enjoy exclusive animated scenes sure to please fans of TVÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s longest-running comedy.
10. Visit your friendsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Springfields, play pranks, and collect cash.

SPRINGFIELD NEVER LOOKED SO GOOD
With HD graphics Ã¢â‚¬â€œ youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll get an eyeful of greener greens, yellower yellows, and more.

IS THAT ALL? Of course not! Did you know that you can even play this game in French, Italian, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian and Brazilian Portuguese?


What's New:
Robed figures have appeared in Springfield. Not to worry, secret organizations always have the best intentionsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ right?
-PUZZLES: Decipher clues and perform special tasks that will reward you with heaps of prizes.
-CHARACTERS: Plot schemes with Number 1 and set activities for all of the Stonecutters.
-BUILDING: Keep your secrets safe at the Stonecutter Lodge.
-QUESTS: Can Lisa and Bart work together to discover the secrets of the Stonecutters before it is too late?


Note: This game downloads additional content on first launch that can be up to 175MB based on device. We recommend connecting to WIFI the first time you play. This game is also supported with regularly occurring content updates that require additional downloads when released. Please be patient while it loads 


Required Android O/S : 2.3.3+
